title: Who are the value transformers, value co-operators and value gatekeepers? New routes to value preservation in a sufficiency-based circular economy
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Resources, Conservation and Recycling, Volume 204

Author(s): Louise Møller Haase, Ruth Mugge, Mette Alberg Mosgaard, Nancy Bocken, Melanie Jaeger-Erben, Massimo Pizzol, Michael Søgaard Jørgensen
siteTitle: ScienceDirect Publication: Resources, Conservation and Recycling
